application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: FRONT GARDEN		T1 Lilac (Syringa vulgaris) - Reduce crown to the most recent reduction points, removing approx. 1-1.5m of new growth.	T2 Silver Birch (Betula pendula) - Reduce crown to the most recent reduction points, removing approx. 1-1.5m of new growth. Remove specific branch to north (as agreed with client) to limit overhang to lilac and neighbouring front garden. 	REAR GARDEN		G3 Chinese privet (Ligustrum lucidum) - Reduce to limit overhang to rear garden and neighbouring rear garden, and allow more light to gardens and back of buildings. 	T4 Cherry (Prunus spp) - Lightly prune to tidy and ensure limited overhang to neighbouring garden. 	T5 Goat willow - Pussy Willow (Salix caprea) - Inspect for dead limbs and stability - if all ok, reduce to previous reduction points
